Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is truly a game-changer in its category. This product has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its quality and the unique features it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $150. I believe this price reflects not only the value of the product but also the opportunity to experience something truly exceptional. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
